content:
disease: (vertigo) Paroymsal  Positional Vertigo
 symptoms: nausea, unsteadiness, loss of balance, vomiting, headache, spinning movements

disease: AIDS
 symptoms: muscle wasting, patches in throat, high fever, extra marital contacts

disease: Acne
 symptoms: pus filled pimples, blackheads, scurring, skin rash

disease: Alcoholic hepatitis
 symptoms: distention of abdomen, abdominal pain, fluid overload, vomiting, history of alcohol consumption, swelling of stomach, yellowish skin

disease: Allergy
 symptoms: watering from eyes, shivering, continuous sneezing, chills

disease: Arthritis
 symptoms: muscle weakness, movement stiffness, stiff neck, painful walking, swelling joints

disease: Bronchial Asthma
 symptoms: family history, high fever, mucoid sputum, breathlessness, fatigue, cough

disease: Cervical spondylosis
 symptoms: weakness in limbs, neck pain, loss of balance, dizziness, back pain

disease: Chicken pox
 symptoms: red spots over body, high fever, itching, swelled lymph nodes, lethargy, headache, skin rash, loss of appetite, fatigue, malaise, mild fever

disease: Chronic cholestasis
 symptoms: nausea, abdominal pain, itching, vomiting, yellowing of eyes, loss of appetite, yellowish skin

disease: Common Cold
 symptoms: redness of eyes, phlegm, sinus pressure, chills, high fever, muscle pain, runny nose, headache, chest pain, loss of smell, congestion, swelled lymph nodes, fatigue, cough, malaise, continuous sneezing, throat irritation

disease: Dengue
 symptoms: nausea, chills, red spots over body, high fever, pain behind the eyes, muscle pain, vomiting, headache, skin rash, joint pain, malaise, loss of appetite, fatigue, back pain

disease: Diabetes 
 symptoms: polyuria, obesity, increased appetite, weight loss, blurred and distorted vision, lethargy, excessive hunger, restlessness, fatigue, irregular sugar level

disease: Dimorphic hemmorhoids(piles)
 symptoms: bloody stool, pain in anal region, constipation, pain during bowel movements, irritation in anus

disease: Drug Reaction
 symptoms: burning micturition, stomach pain, itching, skin rash, spotting  urination

disease: Fungal infection
 symptoms: dischromic  patches, nodal skin eruptions, itching, skin rash

disease: GERD
 symptoms: vomiting, ulcers on tongue, chest pain, acidity, stomach pain, cough

disease: Gastroenteritis
 symptoms: sunken eyes, dehydration, diarrhoea, vomiting

disease: Heart attack
 symptoms: chest pain, breathlessness, sweating, vomiting

disease: Hepatitis B
 symptoms: yellow urine, abdominal pain, receiving unsterile injections, itching, lethargy, receiving blood transfusion, yellowing of eyes, loss of appetite, fatigue, malaise, dark urine, yellowish skin

disease: Hepatitis C
 symptoms: nausea, family history, yellowing of eyes, loss of appetite, fatigue, yellowish skin

disease: Hepatitis D
 symptoms: nausea, abdominal pain, vomiting, yellowing of eyes, joint pain, loss of appetite, fatigue, dark urine, yellowish skin

disease: Hepatitis E
 symptoms: nausea, coma, acute liver failure, abdominal pain, high fever, vomiting, yellowing of eyes, joint pain, loss of appetite, fatigue, dark urine, stomach bleeding, yellowish skin

disease: Hypertension 
 symptoms: loss of balance, headache, chest pain, dizziness, lack of concentration

disease: Hyperthyroidism
 symptoms: muscle weakness, weight loss, abnormal menstruation, irritability, mood swings, excessive hunger, diarrhoea, restlessness, fatigue, sweating, fast heart rate

disease: Hypoglycemia
 symptoms: nausea, blurred and distorted vision, vomiting, slurred speech, palpitations, headache, excessive hunger, irritability, fatigue, anxiety, sweating, drying and tingling lips

disease: Hypothyroidism
 symptoms: abnormal menstruation, weight gain, lethargy, cold hands and feets, enlarged thyroid, dizziness, brittle nails, irritability, fatigue, swollen extremeties, mood swings, depression, puffy face and eyes

disease: Impetigo
 symptoms: blister, high fever, skin rash, red sore around nose, yellow crust ooze

disease: Jaundice
 symptoms: abdominal pain, high fever, itching, weight loss, vomiting, fatigue, dark urine, yellowish skin

disease: Malaria
 symptoms: nausea, chills, high fever, muscle pain, vomiting, headache, diarrhoea, sweating

disease: Migraine
 symptoms: blurred and distorted vision, stiff neck, headache, excessive hunger, acidity, visual disturbances, irritability, indigestion, depression

disease: Osteoarthristis
 symptoms: hip joint pain, neck pain, painful walking, joint pain, knee pain, swelling joints

disease: Paralysis (brain hemorrhage)
 symptoms: altered sensorium, headache, weakness of one body side, vomiting

disease: Peptic ulcer diseae
 symptoms: internal itching, abdominal pain, vomiting, loss of appetite, indigestion, passage of gases

disease: Pneumonia
 symptoms: phlegm, chills, high fever, breathlessness, rusty sputum, chest pain, fatigue, cough, sweating, malaise, fast heart rate

disease: Psoriasis
 symptoms: inflammatory nails, small dents in nails, silver like dusting, skin rash, joint pain, skin peeling

disease: Tuberculosis
 symptoms: phlegm, blood in sputum, chills, weight loss, high fever, swelled lymph nodes, vomiting, breathlessness, chest pain, yellowing of eyes, loss of appetite, fatigue, cough, sweating, malaise, mild fever

disease: Typhoid
 symptoms: nausea, toxic look (typhos), chills, abdominal pain, belly pain, high fever, vomiting, constipation, headache, diarrhoea, fatigue

disease: Urinary tract infection
 symptoms: foul smell of urine, continuous feel of urine, burning micturition, bladder discomfort

disease: Varicose veins
 symptoms: swollen blood vessels, cramps, obesity, swollen legs, prominent veins on calf, fatigue, bruising

disease: hepatitis A
 symptoms: nausea, abdominal pain, muscle pain, vomiting, yellowing of eyes, joint pain, diarrhoea, loss of appetite, dark urine, mild fever, yellowish skin
